name: Kh-29T
description:
The Kh-29 (Russian: Ð¥-29; NATO: AS-14 'Kedge'; GRAU: 9M721) is a Soviet air-to-surface missile.

It has a large warhead of 320 kg, has a choice of laser, infrared, active radar or TV guidance, and is typically carried by tactical aircraft.

The T version uses TV guidance.
